programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: There is public confusion when King Charles II bans coffee shops and a seasick chicken ruins a Roman sea battle. Later, mighty Egyptian Pharaoh, Ramesses II, meets some smelly peasants on Historical Wife Swap, and a cave-dwelling Stone Age couple try to buy their first house.

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: A Victorian businessman goes undercover in his own factory and theres a right royal squabble over who should rule medieval England. programme.title: The Catch-Up
programme.desc: A round-up of the days news.

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson makes a film about the BMW X6 and ends up conducting one of the most expensive road tests in `Top Gear history. James May drives the new Vauxhall Insignia VXR, accompanied by Margaret Calvert, the designer of Britains road signs; and Richard Hammond tests the £340,000 Lexus supercar. The Star in a Reasonably Priced Car is blues musician Seasick Steve.

programme.title: Missing in Paradise: Searching for Sarm
programme.desc: Tir Dhondy retraces Sarms last known movements before her disappearance from a charter yacht in 2021. She hears Sarms boyfriend, Ryan Bane, give his account of what happened through his lawyer.

programme.title: Missing in Paradise: Searching for Sarm
programme.desc: Tir meets with island police and is given CCTV footage that has never been released, showing Sarms last known movements with her boyfriend, Ryan Bane.

programme.title: Missing in Paradise: Searching for Sarm
programme.desc: Tir searches for the yacht Sarm vanished from and tracks down Ryan Banes ex-wife, hearing first-hand about her experiences while married to him.

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson makes a film about the BMW X6 and ends up conducting one of the most expensive road tests in `Top Gear history. James May drives the new Vauxhall Insignia VXR, accompanied by Margaret Calvert, the designer of Britains road signs; and Richard Hammond tests the £340,000 Lexus supercar. The Star in a Reasonably Priced Car is blues musician Seasick Steve.

programme.title: Juice
programme.desc: After splitting up with Guy, Jamma is now between jobs and sleeping on Winnies sofa. When he unexpectedly sees Guy for the first time in six months, the spark is undeniable. A handsome stranger takes a special interest in their relationship status.

programme.title: Juice
programme.desc: Guy is double-booked himself, so he asks Jamma to house-sit and let the builder in. Jamma finds Guys manuscript about exes. Isaac comes over to calm Jamma down. Farida arrives with divorce papers and a new showbiz career to show off about.

programme.title: Missing in Paradise: Searching for Sarm
programme.desc: Tir Dhondy retraces Sarms last known movements before her disappearance from a charter yacht in 2021. She hears Sarms boyfriend, Ryan Bane, give his account of what happened through his lawyer.

programme.title: Missing in Paradise: Searching for Sarm
programme.desc: Tir meets with island police and is given CCTV footage that has never been released, showing Sarms last known movements with her boyfriend, Ryan Bane.

programme.title: Missing in Paradise: Searching for Sarm
programme.desc: Tir searches for the yacht Sarm vanished from and tracks down Ryan Banes ex-wife, hearing first-hand about her experiences while married to him.

programme.title: Ibiza: Secrets of the Party Island
programme.desc: Zara comes face to face with the criminal economy that keeps the drugs flowing in Ibiza.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michaels exploration of Essex continues in Romford, where he visits a state-of-the-art rail operating centre. On the River Blackwater, he visits the Ross Revenge, home of Radio Caroline.

programme.title: This Is BBC TWO
programme.desc: Preview of upcoming programmes from BBC Two.

programme.title: Take a Hike
programme.desc: The second hike in north west Wales is hosted by 32-year-old binman Gareth. He takes the group to where he lives with his family, next to the beautiful Bala Lake in Snowdonia National Park.

programme.title: Countryfile
programme.desc: This week, Countryfile heads to Inkberrow in Worcestershire - the village that provided inspiration for Britains longest-running radio drama, The Archers.

programme.title: Breakfast
programme.desc: The BBCs Breakfast programme features the latest news, sport, business, weather and other items on a daily basis.

programme.title: Beechgrove Garden
programme.desc: The team are at Beechgrove planning ahead, with Kirsty and Brian already preparing for a vibrant and fragrant 2026.

programme.title: Landward
programme.desc: Dougie is in Lairg for the first of the annual autumn lamb sales, and Shahbaz is in Moray to see the aftermath of Scotlands biggest wildfire.

programme.title: Saturday Kitchen Best Bites
programme.desc: A feast of food from Freddy Bird, Imad Alarnab, Gemma Ogston and Philip Khoury. Meanwhile, Rick Stein and the Hairy Bikers head out across the UK.

programme.title: Hairy Bikers Best of British
programme.desc: Dave and Si explore how our love affair with beer and cider has evolved over centuries. At one time it was safer to drink beer than water and the Bikers visit a cider festival, where they press their own.

programme.title: Mary, Queen of Scots
programme.desc: Elizabeth I of England and her Catholic cousin, Mary Stuart, use political intrigue to manoeuvre for the English throne. Along the way they faces perilous and dangerous foes, each wanting their own chance of securing the throne.

programme.title: Lifeline
programme.desc: Following the work of different charities and highlighting ways of supporting their activities. Featuring different ways to raise money, as well as awareness for a wide range of causes.

programme.title: UCI Road World Championships LIVE
programme.desc: Jill Douglas presents live coverage of the UCI Road World Championships mens time trial - the first to be held in Africa - as the worlds best compete on a hilly course around Kigali, Rwanda. Slovenian superstar Tadej Pogacar embarks on the first part of his bid to claim the time trial and road race double in Kigali, but reigning world champion Remco Evenepoel - the last man to claim both titles in the same year in 2022 - also has his eyes on the world title.

programme.title: Flog It!
programme.desc: Paul discovers the architectural history of Hopetoun House and why it is such a unique treasure in the Scottish countryside.

programme.title: Great Coastal Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillos railway adventure zig-zagging the coasts of the English Channel and the Thames estuary nears its end on the north Kent coast.

programme.title: Saving Lives at Sea
programme.desc: A kayaker has called a mayday after getting into trouble; although hes able to communicate via his VHF radio, its a race against time to find him.

programme.title: Living Next Door to Putin
programme.desc: Continuing her journey north along Russias border, Katya travels from Estonia into snowy Scandinavia. In Finland, a country scarred by past war with Russia, she discovers a state of hyper-preparedness as she travels deep into the bunkers beneath Helsinki. In Norway, she finds a more relaxed attitude, but one where personal relationships are breaking down in all sorts of ways - between reindeer herders, families and nuclear scientists.

programme.title: Deep Ocean: Kingdom of the Coelacanth
programme.desc: David Attenborough reveals the oceans depths to uncover the coelacanth - a primeval fish hidden for 400 million years. Its mysterious movements reveal vital clues to lifes journey from sea to land, unlocking secrets of evolution and survival.

programme.title: Rob and Rylans Passage to India
programme.desc: The boys board a packed train to Rajasthan during Diwali, the vibrant festival of lights. Known as the `land of kings, Rajasthan enchants the pair, with its grand forts and opulent palaces.

programme.title: Carrie
programme.desc: Carrie White is a shy young girl who doesnt make friends easily. After her classmates taunt her about her horrified reaction to her totally unexpected first period, one of them takes pity on her and gets Tommy Ross, her boyfriend and class hunk to invite Carrie to the senior prom. Meanwhile, another girl who has been banned from the prom for her continued aggressive behaviour is not as forgiving.

programme.title: Get Out
programme.desc: A young photographer uncovers a dark secret when he meets his girlfriends seemingly friendly parents for the first time at their posh estate.

programme.title: Question Time
programme.desc: Features a studio audience quizzing top politicians on the events of the day. The panel surrounding presenter Fiona Bruce is composed of at least one member of the three major parties.

programme.title: Panorama
programme.sub-title: Trump and Starmer: The Special Relationship?
programme.desc: Current affairs programme, featuring interviews and investigative reports on all aspects of life in Britain.

programme.title: MasterChef
programme.desc: The semi-finals continue, with the brief for the remaining six cooks set by none other than pioneer of molecular gastronomy Heston Blumenthal.

programme.title: The Simpsons

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Marge is cast as Blanche DuBois in a local musical production of `A Streetcar Named Desire. The show stinks but Homers crass comments inspire Marge to give the performance of a lifetime.

programme.title: The Simpsons

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: This weeks competition kicks off at The Red Lion in Charing Heath, Kent. Hosts Lee and Claire hope their matey approach to hosting will set them apart, and treat the BandBers to a masterclass in hospitality at nearby Leeds Castle.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The BandB battle continues in Battle in East Sussex, at Dean and Beckys Glamp in Style campsite. The hosts certainly have novelty on their side, with their unique accommodation. But not everyone is keen to embrace the alternative glamping experience.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Helen and Phil host the weeks third visit at Tottington Manor in West Sussex. Some guests are bowled over by the decor, but others raise their eyebrows at the high prices. An afternoon at a rum distillery makes Helen and Phil the toast of the town.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Sam and Claudia host the weeks final visit at their self-catering Lakeview Studios in Dorset. One couple find a problem in the toilet, before battle lines are drawn at a tank museum.

programme.title: Four in a Bed

programme.title: Formula 1

programme.title: The Inheritance

programme.title: Love Cheats
programme.desc: A female love rat scams Tinder dates out of more than just money with a false pregnancy and a fake terminal cancer. Will she finally face justice in an Australian court?

programme.desc: Alarm dispatcher and former police officer Asger Holm answers an emergency call from a kidnapped woman. When the call is suddenly disconnected, the search for the woman and her kidnapper begins.

programme.title: Marooned With Ed Stafford
programme.desc: Adventurer Ed Stafford has walked the length of the Amazon River - he is the first person to accomplish that - and survived alone for 60 days on a desert island near Fiji (a feat chronicled in `Naked Castaway), so perhaps the challenges presented in `Marooned arent that daunting. Filmed in Venezuelas Gran Sabana mountains, Botswanas Okavango Delta, Romanias Carpathian Mountains, the Western Australia coast, and Borneos Brunei jungles, the five hourlong episodes see Stafford - a former British Army captain - attempt to last ten days in the harsh environments with nothing more than a camera. Viewers are provided a fly-on-the-wall perspective as Ed tries to find food, make fire, process water to drink, and build a shelter - among many other life-saving challenges.

programme.title: Marooned With Ed Stafford
programme.desc: Ed Stafford guides us through his top ten tips for surviving 10 days at a time, in eight of the worlds harshest environments, totally alone.

programme.desc: Leela worries about Ste when he doesnt come home, while Dillon jumps to conclusions. Jez plans a memorial for Sienna. And after a bumpy start, sparks begin to fly between two former lovers.

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon visits Mojito, a Cuban cafe in Brooklyn, New York. Owners Marcelo and Kata used to be married to each other but now fight over everything. Seven years ago, the couple were happy newlyweds and the restaurant was their shared dream, but now the passion has gone and theyre constantly at each others throats, with their staff getting caught in the crossfire.

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon travels to Queens, New York to visit PJs Steakhouse, a restaurant he quickly discovers is all sizzle and no steak. Owners Joe and Madalyn have found themselves in serious debt after opening the high-end restaurant. The couple were overcome by grief when Joes brother PJ passed away. Struggling to move on they decided to take over the lease of PJs bar and turn it into a restaurant.

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon visits Fleming, a Danish restaurant in Miami, Florida. It was once the best family-run restaurant in town, but now the place is on its last legs. Fleming was bought by husband and wife team Andy and Suzanne eight years ago, in the hope of continuing the restaurants past success, but with no clue about Danish cuisine its no real surprise the place is losing money. Can Gordon save their bacon?

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon is at Sushi Ko in California. Owner Akira was a successful sushi chef at someone elses restaurant so he and his wife Lisa decided to branch out on their own. When they started, business was booming but it soon slowed down. Theyre losing up to $20,000 a month and Akira is a shadow of his former self. Gordon is Sushi Kos last hope.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.desc: Its Break Week, and the bakers make pull-apart monkey bread, a fast food Technical and a sweet bread Showstopper. Wholl rise to the top and who kneads to dust themselves off?

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon gets excited when Stephen Hawking agrees to play against him in an online game of `Words with Friends. However, when Sheldon starts to dominate the game, Hawking is less than pleased. Elsewhere, Penny signs up for a class at community college but feels reluctant to tell Leonard about it.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Amy gets upset when Sheldon fails to defend her in an argument with Wil Wheaton during the filming of a new episode of `Fun with Flags. Bernadette pressures Howard to move the rest of his possessions out of his mothers house and into her flat.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The guys notice that Sheldon disappears for 20 minutes right after lunch every day. Filled with curiosity, they attempt to follow him and work out what on earth hes been doing. Meanwhile, Penny befriends a British student in her class and they start exchanging text messages, which makes Leonard jealous, so he tries to discourage their friendship.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: When non-driver Sheldon finds out that his unused parking space at the university has been reallocated to Howard he feels undermined. Howard doesnt see the problem in using something that his friend doesnt need and the two fall out. As their disagreement escalates, each begins to steal items that are not being used at the time from the other, while Amy and Bernadette gradually get drawn into the dispute.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon begrudgingly takes care of Amy when she is sick, but she loves the extra attention so much that she is still pretending to be ill long after her recovery is complete. Bernadette arranges for Howard to go on a fishing trip with her macho father, hoping that they will bond.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Milhouses parents split up: his mum gets together with an American Gladiator called Pyro, his dad self-produces an album, and Milhouse goes a bit crazy. Worried that Marge might divorce him too, Homer decides to divorce her first and re-marry her.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: When a famous and sultry movie star swoops into Springfield with eyes for none other than Ned Flanders, he becomes the envy of Springfield, and Homer is dying to know if they ever did the `deed. The movie star eventually tires of Flanders and returns to LA, but Flanders still refuses to tell Homer what he wants to know. Naturally, Homer goes nuts.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieri digs into some righteous ramen in St. Petersburg, Florida, a funky joint frying up chicken gizzards in Lansing, Michigan, and a New Orleans smokehouse putting out Big Easy favourites like spicy shrimp boudin.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieris grabbing standout sandwiches, including a primo pork burger in Longmont, Colorado, and diving into some serious spice with fiery Thai specialities in Los Angeles.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives

programme.title: Man v Food
programme.desc: Casey Webb ventures to beautiful Boise, Idaho, for a sushi and soup challenge so diabolically spicy that it goes by the name of Demons Delight.

programme.title: Man v Food
programme.desc: Casey Webb travels over the Ozarks to tackle the Goliath, a massive cupcake equal to 22 regular-sized cupcakes.

programme.title: Man v Food
programme.desc: Caseys culinary adventures take him to Wilmington, North Carolina where he tries a BBQ bonanza, a burrito and takes part in the undefeated Pierogi team challenge.

programme.title: Man v Food
programme.desc: Casey Webb is in Hoboken, New Jersey, to sample some tasty treats. He munches on homemade mozzarella, a huge bagel and a ridiculously spicy snack.

programme.title: Man v Food
programme.desc: Adam Richman travels across America on a carnivores holiday. He samples the heartiest breakfasts from Portland to Austin, where he braves the Texas Donut.

programme.title: Man v Food
programme.desc: Casey Webb travels to Grand Rapids, Michigan, where he takes on a five-pound tray loaded with chili dogs, French fries, beer-battered onion rings and a 20-ounce soda.

programme.title: Man v Food
programme.desc: Caseys mouthwatering mission brings him to Tennessee, where he faces his hottest challenge yet, three jumbo chicken tenders smothered in a Carolina Reaper-infused sauce.

programme.title: Man v Food
programme.desc: Casey Webb is in Charlotte, North Carolina, to try three southern specialities, including a cheesy chicken classic, a time-honoured institutions signature sandwich and the biggest walking taco in all the Carolinas.

programme.title: Jamies Easy Meals for Every Day
programme.sub-title: Farmhouse Roast Chicken and Creamy Prawn Linguine
programme.desc: Jamie gives traditional roast chicken a delicious French twist; shows us tasty ways to use up stale bread; and cooks his take on a creamy prawn linguine for his friend and mentor Gennaro Contaldo.

programme.title: Jamies Easy Meals for Every Day
programme.sub-title: Roast Chicken Margherita and Prawn Toast Toastie
programme.desc: Jamie reinvents a roast chicken by combining it with the flavours of a margherita pizza, then whips up some prawn toast toasties, the perfect snack for sharing.

programme.title: James Martins Great British Adventure
programme.desc: Following his French and American Adventures, James Martin explores the British culinary offerings.

programme.title: James Martins Great British Adventure
programme.desc: James Martins British adventure travels as far to the east of England as this journey will go, to Norfolk, where he is joined by his good old mate and top local chef, Galton Blackiston. They meet in Cromer, where Galton has a successful fish and chip shop, which inspires James to cook pan-fried cod with a warm tartar sauce on the beach. Then James heads to Norfolk Lavender to find out why it grows so well in this county and how its distilled for oil.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.desc: The semi-finalists are challenged to make signature baklava, a German schichttorte, and for the Showstopper Challenge, two elegant entremets.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.desc: The finalists head to the tent to tackle their last three challenges. Each one is a worthy winner, but who will be crowned winner of `The Great British Bake Off 2014?

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.desc: Once again 12 new bakers don their aprons and head for the iconic tent in the heart of the British Countryside. The bakers first signature challenge is to make a Madeira cake and their first showstopper is the classic Black Forest gateau.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.desc: Theres 11 bakers left in the tent and they face the signature challenge of creating 24 biscotti. The technical challenge is arlettes and the showstopper is an edible biscuit box of 36 biscuits of a different flavour.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.desc: Its bread week in the tent and the bakers must create quick breads for the signature challenge. The technical challenge is baguettes and for the showstopper, the bakers must make edible 3D Bread sculptures.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.desc: Theres nine bakers left in the tent and the signature challenge is a French classic - creme brulee. The technical challenge tasks the bakers with making a Spanische windtorte and the showstopper calls for a stack of tiered cheesecakes.

programme.title: James Martins Islands to Highlands
programme.desc: James and his wingman, top chef Mark Jordan, hop aboard their motorbikes to discover the wonderful island of Guernsey. They sample local speciality Gache cake, a seafood platter fit for a king, and James uses Guernseys wonderful dairy produce to make a delicious creamy rice pudding with chargrilled peaches. Finally, James and Mark set themselves a fishing challenge by attempting to catch the King of the Sea: the mighty turbot.

programme.title: James Martins Islands to Highlands
programme.desc: James discovers the delights of Dorset. He is joined on his trip by his mate and Michelin-starred chef Paul Ainsworth. They hop aboard a millionaires yacht, where James cooks a delicious sea bass dish. Paul discovers some fantastic local cheese, while James visits a breeder with mangalista pigs in a beautiful coastline setting. The highlight of their day is a beachside barbecue, where they feast on some amazing pork and chicken cooked al fresco.

programme.title: James Martins Islands to Highlands
programme.desc: James is joined by top TV chef Monica Galetti. Theyre in Oxford, where Monica discovers the delights of an organic local distiller. James takes a river trip to a fantastic pick your own farm where he picks some raspberries and he uses them to cook a delicious pudding on the banks of the river. James also visits one of the worlds best chefs, Raymond Blanc, at his restaurant Le Manoir aux QuatSaisons, where he enjoys some of Raymonds Michelin-starred dishes.

programme.title: James Martins Islands to Highlands
programme.desc: James is in South Wales, accompanied by Michelin-starred chef Stephen Terry. James discovers award-winning Welsh wine and cooks a Welsh lamb ragu on a beautiful mountainside. He samples the delights of organic Welsh chocolate and visits cooking legend Shaun Hill at his renowned restaurant The Walnut Tree. The day comes to an end at Barry Island, where James and Stephen enjoy all the fairground rides at this famous resort and James cooks Barry Island churros overlooking the beach.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieris rolling out with a little holey moley in New Hampshire, where a joint is puttin out bomb bagels. In North Carolina, a funky spot is adding a Southern spin to egg rolls, and a fun Florida chef is goin prime time with pastrami and pizza.

Now the original girls - hence, the `OG in the revived series title - return to reveal the challenges of raising children on camera, and how life in the public eye has shaped them as parents and people. Will Wallace and Gromit be able to solve the conundrum before the creature gets shot?

programme.desc: A young boy searches for a way to gain the affections of his dream-girl. In his quest he learns that in order to succeed he must uncover the story of the grumpy but nature-loving Lorax.

programme.title: The Boss Baby
programme.desc: A wildly imaginative seven-year-old boy discovers that his new brother, Boss Baby, is actually a spy on a secret mission, and only he can help thwart a dastardly plot that involves an epic battle between puppies and babies.

programme.title: Turbo
programme.desc: A snail gets the chance to escape his slow-paced life and race in the Indianapolis 500 when a freak accident gives him the power of superspeed.

programme.title: Madagascar
programme.desc: Spoiled by their upbringing and with no idea of what wildlife is really like, Alex the lion, Marty the zebra and hypochondriac giraffe Melman swap New York Central Zoo for madcap Madagascar, on a journey to find their friend.

programme.title: Madagascar: Escape 2 Africa
programme.desc: The sequel to `Madagascar, in which New York Zoo animals, Alex the Lion, Marty the Zebra, Melman the Giraffe and Gloria the Hippo, still stranded on Madagascar, start to leave the island. All of a sudden, they land in the wilderness of Africa, where Alex meets the rest of his family, but has trouble communicating with them after spending so much time at the Central Park Zoo.

programme.title: Rugrats Go Wild
programme.desc: The children and their bickering family are stranded on a desert island. Fortunately help is at hand from the Thornberry family, who are visiting the island to film a rare snow leopard. Once again, animal-understanding Eliza saves the day.

programme.title: Smurfs: The Lost Village
programme.desc: With the evil wizard Gargamel hot on their trail, Smurfette, Brainy, Clumsy and Hefty embark on a journey through the Forbidden Forest to find a mysterious village.

programme.title: Curious George
programme.desc: Curious George is an inquisitive little monkey with an insatiable taste for adventure. Georges fun-loving enthusiastic nature endears him to new friends, but also lands him in a series of misadventures.

programme.title: Scary Girl
programme.desc: To save her father from a dangerous scientist in a world shrouded in darkness, and prevent her planets destruction, a young girl overcomes her fears to travel to a mysterious city of light.

programme.title: DC Super Hero Girls: Legends of Atlantis
programme.desc: Siren and Mera steal the powerful Book of Legends. The Super Hero Girls head to Atlantis to recover the book before Siren can use it to create an army and take over the entire ocean.

programme.title: Dr. Seuss the Lorax
programme.desc: A young boy searches for a way to gain the affections of his dream-girl. In his quest he learns that in order to succeed he must uncover the story of the grumpy but nature-loving Lorax.

programme.title: Scary Girl

programme.title: The Road to El Dorado
programme.desc: Two rogues stumble across a map of the treasures of El Dorado and stow away on an explorers ship bound for South America, where they are mistaken for gods due to their foreign complexions. Narrated by Elton John, who provided the music to Tim Rices lyrics.

programme.title: Despicable Me 4
programme.desc: Gru welcomes a new member to the family, Gru Jr., whos intent on tormenting his dad. However, their peaceful existence soon comes crashing down when criminal mastermind Maxime Le Mal escapes from prison and vows revenge against Gru.

programme.title: Wallace and Gromit in The Curse of the Were-Rabbit
programme.desc: The village is being overrun by rabbits and Wallace has a plan to alter their minds so that they will leave the vegetable allotments alone. However, his plan goes awry and the rabbit problem escalates when the villagers discover a monstrous `were-rabbit destroying everything in its sights. Will Wallace and Gromit be able to solve the conundrum before the creature gets shot?

programme.title: Dr. Seuss the Lorax
programme.desc: A young boy searches for a way to gain the affections of his dream-girl. In his quest he learns that in order to succeed he must uncover the story of the grumpy but nature-loving Lorax.

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: Sherman is getting married to Denise Gains but his alter-ego Buddy Love keeps breaking through. Determined to rid himself of his pesky partner, he extracts Buddys genes, but an accident and a dog hair see Buddy take on his own life. Unaware of his existence, Sherman and Denise perfect their new rejuvenation formula and their fortune seems assured until Buddy steals it.

programme.title: The 90s: Cinemas Greatest Decade
programme.desc: Alex Zane and celebrity film fans go back to the 90s to celebrate some of the decades greatest films, from classic comedies to epic blockbusters.

programme.title: Nacho Libre
programme.desc: Brother Ignacio is an orphanage chef who cooks up a plan to earn money for the kids by becoming a Mexican wrestling star. First, he must don a leotard.

programme.title: Big Daddy
programme.desc: A thirtysomething slacker attempts to inject some stability into his life by adopting an impressionable five-year-old.

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
programme.desc: Scott Pilgrim plays bass guitar in a struggling Toronto-based band and pines after his ex-girlfriend, now a success in her own band. At a party he meets Ramona Flowers and instantly is smitten, but in his pursuit of her he is attacked by Matthew Patel who informs Scott that he is the first of seven evil exes that Scott will have to defeat in order to win Ramona.

programme.title: Singin in the Rain
programme.desc: When the transition is being made from silent films to `talkies, everyone has trouble adapting. Don and Lina have been cast repeatedly as a romantic couple, but when their latest film is remade into a musical, only Don has the voice for the new singing part. After a lot of practise with a diction coach, Lina still sounds terrible, and Kathy, a bright young aspiring actress, is hired to record over her voice.

programme.title: Youve Got Mail
programme.desc: Two rival bookstore owners are unaware that they are conducting a secret romance with each other on the Internet. When they discover the truth, they must prevent their business rivalry from interfering with their growing personal intimacy.

programme.title: Big Daddy
programme.desc: A thirtysomething slacker attempts to inject some stability into his life by adopting an impressionable five-year-old.

programme.title: Daddys Home 2
programme.desc: Brad and Dustys respective fathers show up to turn Christmastime upside down.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop III
programme.desc: Axel Foley and his Beverly Hills buddies investigate criminal activities at a Southern California amusement park.

programme.title: Superbad
programme.desc: Two inseparable best friends navigate the last weeks of high school and are invited to a gigantic house party. Together with their nerdy friend, they spend a long day trying to score enough alcohol to supply the party and inebriate two girls in order to kick-start their sex lives before they go off to college. Their quest is complicated after one of them falls in with two inept cops who are determined to show him a good time.

programme.title: I Dont Understand You
programme.desc: Stranded in rural Italy, an American couple on the verge of adopting tries to reconnect during a disastrous holiday.

programme.title: Beetlejuice Beetlejuice
programme.desc: Still haunted by Beetlejuice, Lydias life gets turned upside down when her daughter discovers a portal to the afterlife. When someone says Beetlejuices name three times, the mischievous demon soon returns to unleash his very own brand of mayhem.

programme.title: The School of Rock
programme.desc: After guitarist Dewey is kicked out of his own band, he pretends to be a teacher. When he hears the kids play, he realises they could be his support group in the Battle of the Bands, and hell finally get to be the rock star he knows hes destined to be.

programme.title: Dads Army
programme.desc: In 1940, with a German invasion looming, the defence of Walmington-on-Sea is in the hands of local bank manager Captain Mainwaring and a motley collection of volunteers. After a series of blunders, the Home Guard finally get the glory they deserve.

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: Weaving in and out of the love lives of eight loosely inter-related couples. The bachelor Prime Minister falls for his personal assistant, his brother-in-law is flirting with one of his colleagues, a writer heads off to France and pursues an affair with a maid, and an 11-year-old boy asks his father for advice on matters of the heart.

programme.title: Turtles All the Way Down
programme.desc: When a 16-year-old struggling with obsessive-compulsive disorder reconnects with her childhood crush, she faces the potential of finding love and happiness despite her mental condition.

programme.title: Boy Meets Boy
programme.desc: Harry has been partying for 48 hours when he meets Johannes on the dance floor of a club in Berlin. With 15 hours until his flight home, Johannes offers to help him print his boarding pass.

programme.title: Funny Girl
programme.desc: Based on the true story of Fanny Brice, who rose from obscurity to become one of Americas most beloved entertainers.

programme.title: Boy Meets Boy
programme.desc: Harry has been partying for 48 hours when he meets Johannes on the dance floor of a club in Berlin. With 15 hours until his flight home, Johannes offers to help him print his boarding pass.

programme.title: Limmensità
programme.desc: Adriana, a young child living in 1970s Rome, moves into a new apartment with her family. While her parents struggle in their unhappy marriage, she questions her gender and starts to identify as a boy under the name Andrea.

programme.title: Dunkirk
programme.desc: Germany advances into France, trapping Allied troops on the beaches of Dunkirk. Under air and ground cover from British and French forces, troops are slowly and methodically evacuated from the beach using every vessel that can be found.

programme.title: Meet Joe Black
programme.desc: When Death arrives on Earth to take a media tycoon to Heaven, his experiences of life as a mortal lead to him falling in love with the doomed mans daughter. Taking the form of a mysterious stranger, Death strikes a deal with the business mogul which allows each of them to spend more time on Earth, but when Deaths handsome form attracts the attention of his victims daughter, the ensuing romance is complicated for all.

programme.title: Chicago
programme.desc: Roxy Hart is sent to prison for shooting her lying lover. In prison she meets tabloid darling and headline singer, Velma Kelly, who is also in for a double murder. With the help of a slick Chicago lawyer, she learns to play the media game and vies for the valuable press attention that will get her out of jail.

programme.title: Saturday Night Fever
programme.desc: A Brooklyn disco dancer develops doubts about his lifestyle when he teams up with an ambitious woman for a big contest.

programme.title: The Holiday
programme.desc: Dumped and depressed, English rose Iris agrees to swap homes with similarly unlucky in love Californian Amanda for a much-needed break. Iris finds herself in a palatial Hollywood mansion while Amanda navigates the lanes of a picture-perfect English village. Soon enough, both lovelorn ladies bump into local lads perfect for a romantic pick-me-up.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: There Will Be Blood
programme.desc: Ruthless silver miner, turned oil prospector, Daniel Plainview moves to oil-rich California. Using his adopted son HW to project a trustworthy, family-man image, Plainview cons local landowners into selling him their valuable properties for a pittance. However, local preacher Eli Sunday suspects Plainviews motives and intentions, starting a slow-burning feud that threatens both their lives.

programme.title: There Will Be Blood
programme.desc: Ruthless silver miner, turned oil prospector, Daniel Plainview moves to oil-rich California. Using his adopted son HW to project a trustworthy, family-man image, Plainview cons local landowners into selling him their valuable properties for a pittance. However, local preacher Eli Sunday suspects Plainviews motives and intentions, starting a slow-burning feud that threatens both their lives.

programme.title: Ella Enchanted
programme.desc: As a child, Ella is put under a spell which makes her constantly obedient. When her evil stepsister starts using the spell against her, Ella must rid herself of the curse if she is to marry the handsome prince, especially as the regent, Sir Edgar, has his own plans for heir to the throne.

programme.title: The Tuxedo
programme.desc: An ordinary cabbie uses gadget-laden formal wear to combat a villain who wants to poison the worlds water supply.

programme.title: Spy Kids 2: The Island of Lost Dreams
programme.desc: The sequel in which the globetrotting sibling duo attempt to reclaim the powerful Transmooker device from the clutches of a mad scientist. Their quest leads them to his tropical island hideaway, which he shares with an assortment of mutant creatures.

programme.title: Snow White and the Huntsman
programme.desc: In a twist to the fairy tale, the Huntsman ordered to take Snow White into the woods to be killed winds up becoming her protector and mentor in a quest to vanquish the Evil Queen.

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.desc: Peter Rabbit and his three sisters -- Flopsy, Mopsy and Cotton-Tail -- enjoy spending their days in Mr. McGregors vegetable garden. When one of McGregors relatives suddenly moves in, hes less than thrilled to discover a family of rabbits in his new home. A battle of wills soon breaks out as the new owner hatches scheme after scheme to get rid of Peter -- a resourceful rabbit who proves to be a worthy and wily opponent.

programme.title: The Golden Compass
programme.desc: In a parallel universe, young orphan Lyra Belacqua resides in Oxford under the patronage of her dashing adventurer Uncle, Lord Asriel. When Lyra comes into possession of an alethiometer, a compass that truthfully answers any question, there are people who will do anything to get hold of it, and Lyra finds herself on an epic quest to the frozen North to safeguard the future of her entire world.

programme.title: The Witches
programme.desc: Creepy fairy tale following the fortunes of a young orphan who becomes embroiled in a supernatural adventure. Brought up on his kindly grandmothers scary stories about witches, he stumbles on a real coven while on holiday. Overhearing their plans to capture all the children in Britain, he sets out to stop them, remaining undeterred throughout - even when he has been turned into a mouse.

programme.title: Spy Kids 3: Game Over
programme.desc: The Spy Kids set off on their third adventure. Secret Agent Carmen finds herself trapped in a 3-D virtual reality video game designed by their new arch nemesis, the Toymaker. Juni must save his sister, as they battle it out against lifelike 3-D monsters, completing each progressively harder level and ultimately trying to save the youth of the world.

programme.title: Johnny English
programme.desc: Spoof spy caper with the eponymous, blundering hero attempting to recover the crown jewels and save Britain from an evil mastermind when all the other agents are killed. Promoted from lowly pen pusher to super spy, Johnny English is baffled when clues lead to respected entrepreneur Pascal Sauvage, but could the enigmatic Lorna hold the key to the mystery?

programme.title: Johnny English Reborn
programme.desc: A haphazard spy returns to MI-7 after years in a Tibetan monastery honing his zen skills. Armed with gizmos, gadgets and chaotic luck he takes on a global ring of assassins.

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Live-action version of the classic stone-age cartoon series. Fred Flintstone donates his family savings to help neighbour Barney Rubble and wife Betty adopt a child, much to the dismay of mother-in-law Pearl. To return the favour, Barney swaps slabs with Fred in an aptitude test, resulting in Freds being promoted and becoming involved in an embezzlement plot, while Barney is left in the dole queue.

programme.title: The Flintstones in Viva Rock Vegas
programme.desc: Prehistoric prequel in which working-class college leavers Fred and Barney decide to set off for a fun weekend in Rock Vegas with their two new girlfriends, Wilma and Betty. Fred, however, has a rival for the affections of his classy girlfriend Wilma - the wealthy playboy Chip Rockefeller.

programme.title: The Tuxedo
programme.desc: An ordinary cabbie uses gadget-laden formal wear to combat a villain who wants to poison the worlds water supply.

programme.title: Pups United
programme.desc: A group of talking dogs save the Youth World Cup football finals.

programme.title: Friend or Foe
programme.desc: WWII evacuee David hates the Germans, but now his life has been saved by one. What is the right thing to do, tell the Army or offer his help?

programme.title: The Flintstones in Viva Rock Vegas
programme.desc: Prehistoric prequel in which working-class college leavers Fred and Barney decide to set off for a fun weekend in Rock Vegas with their two new girlfriends, Wilma and Betty. Fred, however, has a rival for the affections of his classy girlfriend Wilma - the wealthy playboy Chip Rockefeller.

programme.title: The Tuxedo
programme.desc: An ordinary cabbie uses gadget-laden formal wear to combat a villain who wants to poison the worlds water supply.

programme.title: Pups United
programme.desc: A group of talking dogs save the Youth World Cup football finals.

programme.title: Friend or Foe
programme.desc: WWII evacuee David hates the Germans, but now his life has been saved by one. What is the right thing to do, tell the Army or offer his help?

programme.title: Brewsters Millions
programme.desc: Montgomery Brewster is a low-league baseball player who suddenly finds out that a distant relative has left him $300 million. However, theres a catch: he has to waste $30 million in just 30 days without anyone knowing hes doing it.

programme.title: A League of Their Own
programme.desc: Based on a true story, this film, set during World War II, tells the story of the all-female baseball league that was started while the American men were away fighting in Europe. After a team of potential players has been recruited, former player Jimmy Dugan coaches the girls and prepares them for the World Series.

programme.title: Parenthood
programme.desc: An over-protective dad, determined to do a better job than his own distant father, anxiously dotes on his troubled eight-year-old son. His brother, meanwhile, strives to mould his toddler daughter into an academic high-flyer, and his sister struggles with two rebellious, angst-ridden teenagers.

programme.title: Home Delivery
programme.desc: A plus-size supermodel invites her family over to experience the birth of her first child. (2025, 90 mins)

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: When a criminal plot endangers the beach, Mitch Buchannon leads his elite squad of lifeguards on a mission to prove that one doesnt need to wear a badge to save the bay.

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: Professor Sherman, a 450lb scientist, falls for his new colleague Professor Carla Purty, but out on a date, hes humiliated by a nightclub comedian about his weight. Upset and depressed, he takes a potion hes only tested previously on hamsters and - hey presto - he turns into a svelte and cool-talking babe-magnet, Buddy Love.

programme.title: Happy Gilmore
programme.desc: Happy Gilmore is a bad boy ice hockey player who fails to make the grade because he cant skate or control his temper, but he does have a powerful shot and realises he can hit a golf ball 400 yards. When his grans house is repossessed because she never paid tax, he agrees to take up golf to try and win enough money to buy it back, but he cant putt and the golfing establishment arent happy to have him around.

programme.title: 13 Going on 30
programme.desc: Jenna is desperate for acceptance at school. After wishing that she was older, she wakes up with a job, a flat and a boyfriend, but is being 30 all its cracked up to be? Jenna discovers she isnt the person she thought shed be when she grew up.

programme.title: Miss Congeniality
programme.desc: An uncouth FBI agent goes undercover in the Miss United States beauty pageant as a contestant to flush out a terrorist who plans to bomb the event. The hard-nosed cop, who prides herself on her toughness, must discard her trainers and feminise her behaviour if she is to avoid blowing her cover.

programme.title: Miss Congeniality 2: Armed and Fabulous
programme.desc: FBI agent Gracie is given another makeover to become the face of the Bureau, prior to embarking on a promotional tour. When two of her friends are kidnapped - Miss USA and a beauty pageant director - she decides to investigate on her own, in defiance of orders to the contrary.

programme.title: Erin Brockovich
programme.desc: Based on the true story of an unsophisticated single mother who stumbles upon an environmental cover-up. While working for a lawyer, she is puzzled by an old case and decides to do some research of her own. She discovers that a chemical company knowingly polluted the local area, and with the help of the lawyer launches a class action to sue the company for damages.

programme.title: Just Friends
programme.desc: An LA record producer returns to his New Jersey hometown ten years after being rejected by his high-school cheerleader crush. Having made the transformation from no-hope geek to Greek god womaniser and with his friend still single, he embarks on a second seduction strategy that does not always go to plan.

programme.title: Grease
programme.desc: High-spirited musical set in 1950s America, in which a girl and boy who met on the beach are unexpectedly reunited at high school. She cannot understand how different he has become. Can the leather-clad, tough-talking leader of the T-Birds really be the same person? Perhaps her new friends, the Pink Ladies, can help her win back his heart?

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Housesitter
programme.desc: Newton Davis builds a dream home for his childhood sweetheart and is promptly dumped. Devastated, he seeks solace in the arms of a waitress, but sneaks off into the night once hes had his fun. The spurned waitress exacts her revenge by moving into the empty house and masquerading as Newtons wife. At this stage, things start getting complicated.

programme.title: 13 Going on 30
programme.desc: Jenna is desperate for acceptance at school. After wishing that she was older, she wakes up with a job, a flat and a boyfriend, but is being 30 all its cracked up to be? Jenna discovers she isnt the person she thought shed be when she grew up.

programme.title: 50 First Dates
programme.desc: Playboy vet Henry sets his heart on romancing Lucy, but she has short-term memory loss; she cant remember anything that happened the day before. So every morning, Henry has to woo her again. Her friends and family are very protective, and Henry must convince them that hes in it for love.

programme.title: Mamma Mia!
programme.desc: Set on a Greek island, a young woman who is about to be married suspects that any one of three men could be her father. She invites them all to her wedding without telling her mother. Movie adaptation of the musical, set to Abbas greatest hits.

programme.title: Mamma Mia! Here We Go Again
programme.desc: In 1979 Donna falls in love with Sam while embarking on a series of adventures throughout Europe. In the present day, Donnas pregnant daughter reunites with her mothers old friends and boyfriends on the Greek island of Kalokairi.

programme.title: The Holiday
programme.desc: Dumped and depressed, English rose Iris agrees to swap homes with similarly unlucky in love Californian Amanda for a much-needed break. Iris finds herself in a palatial Hollywood mansion while Amanda navigates the lanes of a picture-perfect English village. Soon enough, both lovelorn ladies bump into local lads perfect for a romantic pick-me-up.

programme.title: A League of Their Own

programme.title: 300: Rise of an Empire
programme.desc: Greek Gen. Themistocles leads the charge to fight invading Persian forces led by the god Xerxes -- once a mortal -- and Artemisia.

programme.title: Gods of Egypt
programme.desc: When Set, the Egyptian god of darkness, manages to ascend to the throne of the Egyptian empire. Mortal Bek and the God of the sky Horus join together to save the world and Beks love.

programme.title: Charlies Angels
programme.desc: Charlies PI company is approached by Eric Knox, owner of Knox Technologies, whose revolutionary voice-recognition software has been stolen. Angels Natalie, Dylan and Alex are sent to place a bug in the system of bitter rival Roger Corwin, who is under strong suspicion, but after the deed is done, the Angels and their sidekick Bosley face the fact of a destroyed home base as well as Charlies life in immediate danger.

programme.title: Charlies Angels: Full Throttle
programme.desc: The girls are on the hunt for two gold rings that hold the new identities of every single person who has entered the FBIs Witness Protection Program. When some of them turn up dead, the race is on to find the perpetrators, while using their cunning, guile, martial arts and amazing outfits to get what they want.

programme.title: Evolution
programme.desc: A science professor and his cohorts battle a slew of rapidly growing alien organisms that threaten to overrun the Earth.

programme.title: The Fall Guy
programme.desc: Battle-scarred stuntman Colt Seavers springs back into action when a movie star suddenly disappears. As the mystery deepens, he soon finds himself ensnared in a sinister plot that pushes him to the edge of a fall more dangerous than any stunt.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
programme.desc: The intrepid explorer Indiana Jones sets out to rescue his father, a medievalist who has vanished while searching for the Holy Grail. Following clues in the old mans notebook, Indy arrives in Venice, where he enlists the help of a beautiful academic, but they are not the only ones who are on the trail, and some sinister old enemies soon come out of the woodwork.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull
programme.desc: Professor Henry Jones is given a coded message during the Cold War which leads him to Peru in search of a legendary skull. Jones needs to deliver the skull to its rightful place, but Soviet agents who are trailing Jones have other plans which will endanger the West if the artefact falls into their hands.

programme.title: Fast and Furious
programme.desc: Dominic Toretto is forced to come out of hiding when a loved one is brutally murdered. Heading to LA to track down the culprit, he crosses paths with Brian OConnor, the FBI agent whose undercover infiltration of Torettos gang led to the motorised miscreants exile across the border. The two men temporarily put their differences aside as they investigate the killing.

programme.title: Collateral
programme.desc: After a long day, LA taxi driver Max is about to knock off when sharp-suited Vincent offers him $600 to make five stops. Sounds good until Vincent turns out to be a merciless hitman and each one of those stops involves a hit. As the night goes on, Max starts to wonder if hell live to see the sunrise, as the pair are hunted by the police and the FBI.

programme.title: Cloverfield
programme.desc: A leaving party for New Yorker Rob Hawkins is rudely interrupted by the arrival of an unwelcome guest, something that has a penchant for smashing up skyscrapers, playing football with the Statue of Libertys head and handpicking humans as snacks.

programme.title: The Invisible Man
programme.desc: After staging his own suicide, a crazed scientist uses his power to become invisible to stalk and terrorise his ex-girlfriend. When the police refuse to believe her story, she decides to take matters into her own hands and fight back.

programme.title: The Book of Clarence
programme.desc: A down-on-his-luck man struggles to find a better life for his family while fighting to free himself of debt. Captivated by the power and glory of the rising Messiah, he risks everything to carve his own path to a divine life.

programme.title: Evolution

programme.title: Amongst the Wolves
programme.desc: Danny, an ex-soldier homeless in Dublin, meets Will, a teen fleeing a drug gang. Their encounter forces them to confront their pasts while navigating the harsh realities they face.

programme.title: Die Alone
programme.desc: A young man with amnesia bands together with a rugged survivalist after a devastating virus causes a zombie-like outbreak.

programme.title: The Lord of the Rings: The War of the Rohirrim
programme.desc: A sudden attack by Wulf, a ruthless Dunlending lord, forces Helm Hammerhand and his people to make a daring last stand in the ancient stronghold of the Hornburg. Finding herself in a desperate situation, Helms daughter must lead the resistance.

programme.title: Wish You Were Here
programme.desc: When a perfect night with a perfect stranger ends suddenly the next morning, Charlotte searches for answers and meaning in her life. However, she soon uncovers a shocking secret that changes everything she knows about the man who captured her heart.

programme.title: Love Hurts
programme.desc: Marvin is a Milwaukee realtor who receives a crimson envelope from a former partner-in-crime whom he left for dead. He now finds himself thrust back into a world of ruthless hit men and double-crosses that turn his open houses into deadly war zones.

programme.title: Wolf Man
programme.desc: Attacked by an unseen animal, Blake and his family barricade themselves inside a farmhouse as the creature prowls the perimeter. As the night stretches on, however, he begins to behave strangely, transforming into something unrecognizable.

programme.title: Nosferatu
programme.desc: A new bride is left under the care of friends when her husband travels to Transylvania for a meeting with Count Orlok. Plagued by horrific visions and an increasing sense of dread, she soon encounters an evil force thats far beyond her control.

programme.title: The Surfer
programme.desc: A man revisits his childhood beach to surf with his son. Humiliated by locals, he becomes entangled in an escalating conflict that pushes him to his limits.

programme.desc: Escaping postwar Europe, a visionary architect comes to America to rebuild his life, his career, and his marriage. On his own in a strange new country, he settles in Pennsylvania, where a wealthy and prominent industrialist recognises his talent.

programme.desc: Marvin is a Milwaukee realtor who receives a crimson envelope from a former partner-in-crime whom he left for dead. He now finds himself thrust back into a world of ruthless hit men and double-crosses that turn his open houses into deadly war zones.

programme.title: Wolf Man
programme.desc: Attacked by an unseen animal, Blake and his family barricade themselves inside a farmhouse as the creature prowls the perimeter. As the night stretches on, however, he begins to behave strangely, transforming into something unrecognizable.

programme.title: Nosferatu
programme.desc: A new bride is left under the care of friends when her husband travels to Transylvania for a meeting with Count Orlok. Plagued by horrific visions and an increasing sense of dread, she soon encounters an evil force thats far beyond her control.

programme.title: The Brutalist
programme.desc: Escaping postwar Europe, a visionary architect comes to America to rebuild his life, his career, and his marriage. On his own in a strange new country, he settles in Pennsylvania, where a wealthy and prominent industrialist recognises his talent.

programme.title: The Brutalist
programme.desc: Escaping postwar Europe, a visionary architect comes to America to rebuild his life, his career, and his marriage. On his own in a strange new country, he settles in Pennsylvania, where a wealthy and prominent industrialist recognises his talent.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Salems Lot
programme.desc: A writer returns to his hometown and discovers that the residents are being turned into vampires.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Dorian Gray
programme.desc: When a naïve young Dorian arrives in Victorian London, he is swept into a social whirlwind by the charismatic Lord Wotton, who introduces Dorian to the pleasures of the city. Henrys friend Basil Hallward paints a portrait of Dorian to capture the full power of his youthful beauty. When the portrait is unveiled, Dorian makes a flippant pledge: he would give anything to stay as he is in the picture - even his soul.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: The Core
programme.desc: The world is struck by inexplicable phenomena - Romes Colosseum explodes, Londons pigeons go berserk - until it becomes apparent that the planets core has stopped moving, causing electro-magnetic mayhem. The only hope lies in a crack team of scientists burrowing to the core and re-starting earths engine, but is the disaster natural or is there a more sinister explanation?

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: The Ring Two
programme.desc: Sequel to the cult horror about a videotape that brings death to anyone who watches it. The journalist from the original film destroys the tape but is pursued by the demon that cursed it and who now wants to possess her son. The Japanese director of the original directs this sequel.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Ready Player One
programme.desc: In 2045 the planet is on the brink of chaos and collapse, but people find salvation in the OASIS: an expansive virtual reality universe created by eccentric James Halliday. When Halliday dies, he promises his immense fortune to the first person to discover a digital Easter egg thats hidden somewhere in the OASIS. When young Wade Watts joins the contest, he finds himself becoming an unlikely hero in a reality-bending treasure hunt through a fantastical world of mystery, discovery and danger.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Battleship
programme.desc: A fleet of ships is forced to do battle with an armada of unknown origins in order to discover and thwart their destructive goals.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Men in Black II
programme.desc: Sequel to the sci-fi comedy about a top secret government task force set up to deal with unruly extraterrestrials. An MIB agent turns to the only man who can help him save the world from a rampaging, shape-shifting alien which has taken on the outward appearance of a sexy lingerie model.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Zombieland
programme.desc: Columbus and Tallahassee have orchestrated a way to survive a world overrun by zombies. With only fear keeping the `big wuss Columbus alive, Tallahassee wants to eradicate the `last Twinkie on Earth. The duo join forces with Wichita and Little Rock who have a style and tact of their own when it comes to dealing with the flesh-eating chaos.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: I Am Legend
programme.desc: In the year 2012, scientists engineer a cure for cancer. Three years later, every human in New York is dead or mutated into a light-sensitive zombie by the virus that was supposed to heal. Only one man survives, virologist Robert Neville. He has two aims: find a cure for the virus and make contact with other survivors.

programme.title: Val
programme.desc: A look at the daily life of actor Val Kilmer with never-before-seen images spanning forty years of his career.

programme.title: Man on Wire
programme.desc: On August 7th 1974, at 7.15am, 24-year-old Frenchman Philippe Petit stepped off the edge of the South Tower of New Yorks World Trade Centre. Armed only with a balancing pole and intense determination, he walked out onto a single suspended wire and `danced for 45 minutes while balancing a quarter of a mile above the pavement below. The is the intimate story of Petit and his group of friends as they followed their dream.

programme.title: Rise of the Superheroes
programme.desc: See how the tales of legendary comic book superheroes like Batman and The Avengers were adapted for cinema before going on to dominate Hollywood and captivate audiences worldwide.

programme.title: On the Line: The Richard Williams Story
programme.desc: Richard Williams retraces his familys journey from the poverty-stricken streets of Louisiana to the grass courts of Wimbledon, fighting back against systems of racial oppression and changing the game of tennis forever.

programme.title: I Am Luke Perry
programme.desc: Celebrating the life of a generational acting talent from humble roots who emerged from small-town obscurity to become a Hollywood heartthrob and a pop culture icon.

programme.title: Tina
programme.desc: A revealing and intimate look at the life and career of musical icon Tina Turner, charting her improbable rise to early fame, her personal and professional struggles throughout her life and her resurgence as a global phenomenon in the 1980s.

programme.title: Death Of A Showjumper
programme.desc: Secrets and Silence: When talented show jumper Katie Simpson dies, those close to her believe shes been murdered. With themes of domestic violence and suicide.

programme.title: The Case Against Adnan Syed
programme.desc: Adnans lawyer Erica J Suter unearths new information in a year-long investigation, exposing flaws in the original case and prosecution, including undisclosed evidence pointing to other potential suspects and untested DNA from the crime scene.

programme.title: Flight 149: Hostage Of War
programme.desc: On 2 August 1990, Iraq takes the world by surprise and invades Kuwait. Hours later, BA Flight 149 from London lands in Kuwait City for a scheduled stop with over 385 men, women and children on board. The plane never reaches its final destination.

programme.title: Wirecard: A Billion Euro Lie
programme.desc: Lifting the lid on the scandal that rocked the financial sector across the globe: the rise and billion-dollar fall of financial payment firm Wirecard.

programme.title: Steve McQueen: The Lost Movie
programme.desc: Rediscovered footage from Steve McQueens incomplete movie, Day of the Champion, reveals the thrill and risk of Formula 1 racing in 1965.

programme.title: Steve McQueen: The Lost Movie

programme.title: The Case Against Adnan Syed
programme.desc: Despite being granted a new trial, Adnan Syed and his attorneys contend with the States repeated appeals. Private investigators grapple with outstanding questions as they re-analyse the forensic evidence surrounding Hae Min Lees death.

programme.title: Althea
programme.desc: Althea Gibson, a truant from the rough streets of Harlem, emerged as a most unlikely queen of the highly segregated tennis world of the 1950s.

programme.title: Discovering Film
programme.desc: Explore the career of one of Britains most celebrated actresses and screenwriters, Dame Emma Thompson.

programme.title: Discovering Film
programme.desc: An exploration of the life and career of a film superstar. From Grease to Pulp Fiction, the award-winning John Travolta is a cultural icon.

programme.title: The Directors
programme.desc: A deep dive into the life and career of the Academy Award-winning director, whose work includes `A Beautiful Mind, `Frost/Nixon and `Apollo 1.

programme.title: Val
programme.desc: A look at the daily life of actor Val Kilmer with never-before-seen images spanning forty years of his career.

programme.title: Man on Wire
programme.desc: On August 7th 1974, at 7.15am, 24-year-old Frenchman Philippe Petit stepped off the edge of the South Tower of New Yorks World Trade Centre. Armed only with a balancing pole and intense determination, he walked out onto a single suspended wire and `danced for 45 minutes while balancing a quarter of a mile above the pavement below. The is the intimate story of Petit and his group of friends as they followed their dream.

programme.title: Rise of the Superheroes
programme.desc: See how the tales of legendary comic book superheroes like Batman and The Avengers were adapted for cinema before going on to dominate Hollywood and captivate audiences worldwide.

programme.title: On the Line: The Richard Williams Story
programme.desc: Richard Williams retraces his familys journey from the poverty-stricken streets of Louisiana to the grass courts of Wimbledon, fighting back against systems of racial oppression and changing the game of tennis forever.

programme.title: I Am Luke Perry
programme.desc: Celebrating the life of a generational acting talent from humble roots who emerged from small-town obscurity to become a Hollywood heartthrob and a pop culture icon.

programme.title: Tina
programme.desc: A revealing and intimate look at the life and career of musical icon Tina Turner, charting her improbable rise to early fame, her personal and professional struggles throughout her life and her resurgence as a global phenomenon in the 1980s.

programme.title: Death Of A Showjumper
programme.desc: Secrets and Silence: When talented show jumper Katie Simpson dies, those close to her believe shes been murdered. With themes of domestic violence and suicide.

programme.title: The Case Against Adnan Syed
programme.desc: Adnans lawyer Erica J Suter unearths new information in a year-long investigation, exposing flaws in the original case and prosecution, including undisclosed evidence pointing to other potential suspects and untested DNA from the crime scene.

programme.title: Flight 149: Hostage Of War
programme.desc: On 2 August 1990, Iraq takes the world by surprise and invades Kuwait. Hours later, BA Flight 149 from London lands in Kuwait City for a scheduled stop with over 385 men, women and children on board. The plane never reaches its final destination.

programme.title: Wirecard: A Billion Euro Lie

programme.desc: A look at the lives of monkeys, chimps, orangutans and apes at the worlds biggest sanctuary, Monkey World Ape Rescue Centre.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas

programme.title: Hope for Wildlife
programme.desc: A new volunteer steps up to the challenge. Hopes first fawn of the year interrupts delicate surgery on an injured owl.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School
programme.desc: At The Nyaru Menteng Orangutan Rescue Centre in Borneo, Indonesia, its extraordinary team of staff rescue orangutans that have been displaced from their habitat or kept as illegal pets, and teach them the skills necessary to survive on their own.

programme.title: Zambia Untamed
programme.desc: In the Luangwa Valley lies a grove of Ebony trees, home to a troop of baboons. But, there are dangers here as the resident leopard is powerful and agile enough to climb trees.

programme.title: Road Wars
programme.desc: Conrad and Simon close in on one of Thames Valleys most wanted - will the fugitive come quietly? Meanwhile, in a dramatic pursuit, a helicopter tracks the movements of a slippery character as he jumps from garden to garden.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: Alison travels to Hampshire to rescue marmoset Clyde from a life in the pet trade, while the young orangutan Hujan gets to meet with older male Bulu in the nursery.

programme.title: Boosnoo! Mashups
programme.desc: BooSnoo! gets soaking wet in some favourite splishy and sploshy moments.

programme.title: Ready Eddie Go!
programme.desc: Eddie visits the optician for an eye test filled with fun activities. Though he is disappointed not to need glasses like Nina, he happily wears his sunglasses instead.

programme.title: Ready Eddie Go!
programme.desc: Eddie goes camping in the woods with his family for the first time. With Scout by his side, he sets up the tent, tells campfire stories, and looks at the stars.

programme.title: The Brilliant World of Tom Gates 2
programme.desc: Tom gets lost in the woods with Uncle Kevin Auntie Alice and the cousins. Liz shows how to doodle a bug with an umbrella.

programme.title: Silly Animals
programme.desc: Gary the vlogging dog, and his friend Rat, take a look at international penguin cliff diving, ducks who arent particularly good at ice skating and a pair of gorillas trying to do gymnastics.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: A visit from the vet awaits one of the parks strangest residents, while the small monkey team lose the battle to save tragic marmoset Koba, who had been taken out of the pet trade.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: Alison looks forward to the prospect of baboons being at the park, while recently arrived marmoset Clyde, rescued from the pet trade, braves the great outdoors for the first time.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: A look at the lives of monkeys, chimps, orangutans, and apes living at the worlds biggest sanctuary, the 65-acre Monkey World Ape Rescue Centre in Wareham, Dorset.

programme.title: Trevor Phillips on Sunday
programme.desc: Trevor Phillips interviews a range of high profile guests on some of the biggest news stories of the week.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Its initiation time for the full-timer Ryan as Dwight takes him out on his first sales call with a side trip to the Schrute family beet farm.

programme.title: The Office
programme.desc: Its Diwali, the Hindu festival of lights, so Michael encourages the entire Scranton branch to support Kelly and attend a local celebration of Diwali.

programme.title: WSL LIVE
programme.desc: The champions Chelsea host Leicester City in a match from the Womens Super League.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: After Homer gets drunk at a party and leers at Maude Flanders, Marge forces him to accompany her on a marriage counselling weekend at a wooded retreat. Unfortunately, Homer is more interested in catching a legendary local catfish than working on his marriage. Back in Springfield, Bart and Lisa throw a party.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: After Bart fools everyone into believing a child has fallen down a well, Sting joins in a celebrity sing-along.

programme.title: Formula 1
programme.desc: Featuring all of the action and highlight from Formula 1 racing.

programme.desc: The team visit Aberglasney House, a derelict manor house in Carmarthenshire, Wales. The area around Aberglasney was the centre for bloody battles, including a particularly violent offensive in 1257.

programme.title: Most Haunted
programme.desc: The team visits Llancaiach Fawr, a 15th-century Tudor manor house near the village of Nelson in South Wales, which is said to be haunted by many of its previous occupants.

programme.title: Most Haunted
programme.desc: Investigating sightings of the ghost of Ruth Ellis, the team visits The Clockhouse, a large Surrey house built across the Medieval, Georgian and Victorian periods that is said to host a number of spiritual entities.

programme.title: Premier League Stories
programme.desc: Flamboyant, fearless, and unforgettable - David Luiz lit up the Premier League with his unique style. From Champions League triumphs at Chelsea to high-stakes drama at Arsenal, his career was packed with silverware and great stories. In this episode, we explore the man behind the headlines: a leader, a teammate, and a born entertainer. Now back in Brazil, Luiz opens up on life after the Premier League and his plans for the future.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Joining the cracker packers of Carlisle on the factory floor, Michael Portillo really takes the biscuit as he investigates the Victorian appetite for the custard cream on his new journey through northwest Britain. Braving a perilous descent into the only operational slate mine in England, Michael discovers a miniature railway which once hauled slate to the surface.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo continues his journey through the Lake District where he discovers a magical world of talking rabbits, ducks, hedgehogs and mice, who have entertained children for more than 100 years. At the village home of author and illustrator Beatrix Potter, he learns about her legacy and her fears about the railways.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Using a nineteenth century Bradshaws Handbook for travelling through Victorian Britain, Michael Portillo sets off on four new railway journeys which will take him across Britain.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Using a nineteenth century Bradshaws Handbook for travelling through Victorian Britain, Michael Portillo sets off on four new railway journeys which will take him across Britain.

programme.title: Warbird Workshop
programme.desc: On the legendary Battle of Britain airfield at Biggin Hill, a dedicated team of young engineers restore to flight a Spitfire that fought over Europe in 1944.

programme.title: Warbird Workshop
programme.desc: A US Army Air Force C47 that dropped paratroopers on D-Day is at the centre of one of the UKs most ambitious warbird rebuilds.

programme.title: Warbird Workshop
programme.desc: A team of engineers fight to return a veteran Westland Wessex helicopter to the skies, 30 years after its last flight.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash: Restoring Classics
programme.desc: The team invest in a piece of French art this week- a 1971 Citroen DS21 Pallas.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash: Restoring Classics
programme.desc: Derek picks out a super low mileage MGC and the team pays a little too much to secure it.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Paul and Charlie pick up a JZR three wheeler speed demon while Dave gets all nostalgic over a brace of Raleigh Choppers, a couple of Honda C90s and a rare Mark 1 Ford Granada.

programme.title: Flipping Bangers
programme.desc: Will and Gus look to make some quick cash as they fix and wrap a Toyota MR2 MK2, but it remains to be seen whether there is any money to be made from this low-spec car.

programme.title: Blue Planet II
programme.desc: From the equator to the poles, new worlds and animal behaviours are revealed, from tool-using fish to mother walruses fighting for space on the ice for their tiring pups.

programme.title: Blue Planet II
programme.desc: A ground-breaking journey to the Deep, the final frontier and home to real-life aliens, from monstrous sharks to shrimps in glass cages and perhaps the origin of all life on Earth.

programme.title: Blue Planet II
programme.desc: Following on from the 2001 award-winning show `The Blue Planet, this natural history series sees David Attenborough return. An exploration of the worlds vast oceans, this series captures animals and other living organisms in their natural habitat.

programme.title: Blue Planet II
programme.desc: The big blue is the worlds greatest wilderness, far from shore and many kilometres deep. Its a vast marine desert where there is little to eat and nowhere to hide. Yet its home to some of the biggest and most spectacular creatures on Earth.

programme.title: Wilderness with Simon Reeve
programme.desc: Simon Reeve travels across the Kalahari in Southern Africa. Along the way, Simon tracks wildebeest with a group of one of the regions indigenous inhabitants, the San, who are renowned for their hunting and tracking techniques.

programme.title: Flipping Bangers
programme.desc: Will and Gus look to make some quick cash as they fix and wrap a Toyota MR2 MK2, but it remains to be seen whether there is any money to be made from this low-spec car.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Paul and Charlie pick up a JZR three wheeler speed demon while Dave gets all nostalgic over a brace of Raleigh Choppers, a couple of Honda C90s and a rare Mark 1 Ford Granada.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash: Restoring Classics
programme.desc: The Restoring Classics team take Dereks advice when he sniffs out the rarest car theyve ever taken on - the last remaining Hillman GT.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash: Restoring Classics
programme.desc: The team lift the shutters on their biggest restoration to date in the shape of a Series 1 Land Rover.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash: Restoring Classics
programme.desc: The team fly the flag for King and country with one of their most luxurious purchases to date - a 1981 Rolls Royce Silver Spirit.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash: Restoring Classics
programme.desc: The team think they can smell profit by choosing one of the simplest cars ever built, the VW Beetle.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash: Restoring Classics
programme.desc: Bangers and Cash spin-off series that follows the journey of a vehicle purchased at a Mathewsons classic car auction, before being repaired, restored and re-auctioned.

programme.title: Zameer
programme.desc: Maharaj Singh is a proud owner of several derby-winning stallions. One day dacoits attack his farmhouse with a view of stealing these stallions, but Maharaj fights them, killing the son of the leader.

programme.title: Blood Money
programme.desc: A young man elopes with the girl he loves and moves to South Africa, where he works in the diamond-exporting business. Slowly, he is pulled into the criminal underworld.

programme.title: Tashan
programme.desc: A game of cat and mouse ensues when a suitcase containing 25 crore is stolen from Kanpurs biggest goon Bhaiji.

programme.title: Dulhan Hum Le Jayenge
programme.desc: A young man and his beloved hatch a plan to win the approval of her three eccentric uncles.

programme.title: Dil To Pagal Hai
programme.desc: Rahul is the director of a successful music and dance group and considers Nisha his best friend. Secretly, she is madly in love with him. Following an injury, new dancer Pooja joins the company and Rahul finds himself falling for her, but she is engaged to Ajay who is the son of the family who raised Pooja following her parents death. As preparations for the new show progress, will Rahul decide on a happy ending?

programme.title: Hum Tum
programme.desc: Cartoonist Karan plays out the battle of the sexes through his animated characters Me and You, which mirror his own love-hate relationship with the headstrong Rhea. As the couples paths cross, their gentle bantering turns to respect and friendship, then finally to love.

programme.title: Kabhi Khushi Kabhie Gham ...
programme.desc: When Rahul falls in love with a lower class girl, his father disowns him. Rahul and his wife move to London, and are met years later by Rahuls brother, who is determined to reunite the family.

programme.title: Bunty Aur Babli 2
programme.desc: Bunty and Babli are a pair of retired con-artists. After a spate of robberies with their trademark sigil start appearing across India the two are forced out of retirement to find out who has been copying them.

programme.title: Bunty Aur Babli 2
programme.desc: Bunty and Babli are a pair of retired con-artists. After a spate of robberies with their trademark sigil start appearing across India the two are forced out of retirement to find out who has been copying them.

programme.title: Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai
programme.desc: After marrying Kartik Goenka, Naira tries to manage her roles as a wife and daughter-in-law with equal aplomb, but she faces many challenges and struggles to overcome them.

programme.title: Kyunki Saas Bhi Kabhi Bahu Thi
programme.desc: Embracing love above all, strong-willed Saas-Bahus keep the Viranis together. But when conspirators try to create a rift, will their familial bond prevail?

programme.title: Jhanak
programme.desc: A driven young woman embarks on a journey to fulfil a mothers promise for a better life as she overcomes challenges and loss while crossing paths with a man who further complicates her life.

programme.title: Ishani
programme.desc: After Ishanis dreams are crushed, she sets off to reinvent herself while seeking love.

programme.title: Anupamaa
